justification: This offer downgrades A at RB (T2 Holt to Out T4 King) and is lateral at WR (T4 to T4), so the “upgrade stability” rationale is incorrect. It ignores B’s incentives and needs (QB/TE injuries, upside leaning) and underestimates B’s likely acceptance; B would probably accept more than 0.42. No clear ToM or separation of perspectives. Feasible but strategically incoherent for A and misaligned with both managers’ stated preferences.
